definition: A structured and organized arrangement of interconnected components or elements, designed to function as a unified whole. It is commonly employed to describe a methodical and coherent approach or framework used to manage, control, or operate various processes, procedures, or activities.

examples.german: Unser Unternehmen hat ein effizientes System zur Datenverwaltung.
examples.english: Our company has an efficient system for data management.

examples.german: Das neue System bietet viele Vorteile gegenüber dem alten.
examples.english: The new system offers many advantages over the old one.

examples.german: Das System ist einfach zu bedienen und benutzerfreundlich.
examples.english: The system is easy to use and user-friendly.

examples.german: Wir müssen das System aktualisieren, um die Sicherheit zu verbessern.
examples.english: We need to update the system to enhance security.
